descriptions.content: The plural of these pronouns is formed by adding one of the following markers: ཚོ་, རྣམས་, ཅག་, or ཅག་རྣམས་. In some cases, the reflexive རང་, “same,” may be added to the pronoun without changing its meaning. In the lists below, abbreviations indicate which pronouns are literary (L), honorific (H), and high honorific (HH). The pronouns are also marked to indicate the ones that are elegant, inclusive, exclusive, and archaic.
